info.name: Florensis
info.description:
DESIGN BY:
Ross Lovegrove

MATERIALS:
The head of the lamp, obtained through a highly innovative process, has both an aesthetic and a technological function. Lovegroveâ€™s organic design translates the requirements of the LED technology into a floral shape that diffuses indirect light and interacts with air to promote heat dissipation. Florensis comes in the dimmable floor and wall versions.

INFORMATIONS:
Led Total power 44,5Wn
warm white 3000Kn
Lighting Output 2710 lmn
Dimmable
